SWFMovie->__construct

(PHP 5 <= 5.3.0, PECL ming SVN)

SWFMovie->__construct — Creates a new movie object, representing an SWF version 4 movie

Description

SWFMovie SWFMovie::__construct ([ int $version ] )
Warning

This function is EXPERIMENTAL. The behaviour of this function, its name, and surrounding documentation may change without notice in a future release of PHP. This function should be used at your own risk.

Creates a new movie object, representing an SWF movie.

Parameters

version

The desired SWF version. Default is 4.
